I am AMAZED at the ridiculous 10/10 ratings here. dont ever believe people watching stuff on their 15' PC monitors.

Sound is OK, about what you can expect from standard AC3 audio.

Video however is BROKEN, intense frame skipping which you might not even notice if all you ever object your eyes to are low quality movie rips leeched off the internet. And the picture is actually free of artifacts and very clear despite the low resolution thanks to the original HD TV source.

But the frame skipping is very noticeable if you know anything about video quality at all, and even amplified by the fast paced editing and hand held camera. My advice - wait for a better source rip.

Actually, disregard my advice for waiting for a good version - it is already here!

To people around the world that may think this movie is ridiculous, it is not.  This may also be applied to my fellow Americans on the east coast.  Ruby Ridge, Waco, Northern Idaho, and the labyrinthine factions of the Mormons.  This shit (figuratively speaking) has happened and most likely will happen again.  Its not a joke.  I applaud Kevin Smith for making this film, even if everyone derides it as shit.  He went 180 against his type and made a sharp, cut-throat "what-the-fa..???" movie. And for people wondering about the film's budget, it was 4 Mil.  There were no divas, and the 'big' names did it for FAR less than warranted (possibly even less than scale).  This movie is NOT a joke.  If you live in the western United States you know this to be true.
